summary: The KEF Q150 5.25" 2-Way Bookshelf Speakers are available in multiple conditions, including used, new, and refurbished.
Pricing varies across listings with used pairs starting at approximately $271.24 and new pairs available for around $263.90, while refurbished units are listed at $95.99.
The used option features minimal wear and includes a 30-day return policy, while some listings offer free shipping or local pickup.
Most sellers maintain a high positive feedback rating of 99.4%, indicating strong customer satisfaction.
Shipping costs vary, with a notable $40 shipping fee for the used pair, while other offers promote free shipping or local pickup.
